Protocols/DDNotificationContactPhotoProv.name: -contactPhotoPromiseOfferForNotification:
Protocols/DDNotificationContactPhotoProv.abstract: Returns an offer to fulfill a promise to provide a contact photo for a notification.

Protocols/DDNotificationContactPhotoProv.name: DDNotificationContactPhotoProviding
Protocols/DDNotificationContactPhotoProv.abstract: An object that can provide contact photos for ShortLook notifications.

Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.name: photoIdentifier
Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.abstract: A unique identifier for the photo that will be provided by this promise.

Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.name: titleOverride
Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.abstract: A string to replace the notification’s title with, if it is required for your provider’s context. Set to “” to remove the provided notification’s title.

Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.name: subtitleOverride
Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.abstract: A string to replace the notification’s subtitle with, if it is required for your provider’s context. Set to “” to remove the provided notification’s subtitle.

Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.name: bodyOverride
Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.abstract: A string to replace the notification’s body with, if it is required for your provider’s context. Set to “” to remove the provided notification’s body.

Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.name: -initWithPhotoIdentifier:
Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.abstract: Initialize a promise with the provided photo identifier.

Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.name: +offerDownloadingPromiseWithPhotoIdentifier:fromURL:
Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.abstract: Create a promise offer that will return the image at the provided URL, if needed.

Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.name: +offerDownloadingPromiseWithPhotoIdentifier:fromURL:withSettings:
Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.abstract: Create a promise offer that will return the image at the provided URL, if needed, with custom settings.

Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.name: +offerInstantlyResolvingPromiseWithPhotoIdentifier:image:
Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.abstract: Create a promise offer that will instantly return the provided image.

Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.name: +offerInstantlyResolvingPromiseWithPhotoIdentifier:image:withSettings:
Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.abstract: Create a promise offer that will instantly return the provided image with custom settings.

Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.name: -fulfillWithBlock:
Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.abstract: Add the block that will run if your image is needed (as it will not be in some cases, such as if your image is already cached by ShortLook).

Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.name: settings
Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.abstract: An object holding the settings pertaining to the photo to be displayed.

Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.name: isComplete
Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.abstract: Whether or not this promise has already been resolved or rejected.

Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.name: -resolveWithImage:
Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.abstract: Resolve this promise with the provided image, notifying ShortLook that you have received your image.

Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.name: -reject
Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.abstract: Reject this promise, notifying ShortLook that you failed to receive an image.

Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoSettin.name: backgroundColor
Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoSettin.abstract: The background colour to show for the contact photo view if the provided image contains any transparency.

Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoSettin.name: usesCaching
Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoSettin.abstract: Whether or not ShortLook should automatically cache the returned image from your provider and use it for all future notifications with the same photo identifier and application.

Classes/DDUserNotification.html#/c:objc(.name: notificationTitle
Classes/DDUserNotification.html#/c:objc(.abstract: A custom notification title, separate from the application’s title.

Classes/DDUserNotification.html#/c:objc(.name: userInfo
Classes/DDUserNotification.html#/c:objc(.abstract: A dictionary of any extra information included by ShortLook.

Classes/DDUserNotification.html#/c:objc(.name: request
Classes/DDUserNotification.html#/c:objc(.abstract: The system notification request that created this notification.

Classes/DDUserNotification.html#/c:objc(.name: -content
Classes/DDUserNotification.html#/c:objc(.abstract: The user notification’s content, sent by the application.

Classes/DDUserNotification.html#/c:objc(.name: -applicationUserInfo
Classes/DDUserNotification.html#/c:objc(.abstract: A dictionary of any extra information provided by the application sending the notification.

Classes/DDUserNotification.html#/c:objc(.name: -senderIdentifier
Classes/DDUserNotification.html#/c:objc(.abstract: The bundle identifier of the application this notification represents.

Classes/DDUserNotification.html.name: DDUserNotification
Classes/DDUserNotification.html.abstract: A ShortLook-displayable notification representing a real user notification sent by an application to the system.

Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoSettin.name: DDNotificationContactPhotoSettings
Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoSettin.abstract: An object representing settings for the photo to be provided by a promise.

Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.name: DDNotificationContactPhotoPromise
Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.abstract: A promise representing a commitment to providing a contact icon for a notification.

Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.name: DDNotificationContactPhotoPromiseOffer
Classes/DDNotificationContactPhotoPromis.abstract: An offer to fulfill a promise representing a commitment to providing a contact icon for a notification.
